Tips and Tricks: Thesis Writing Using Latex and Ms Word \[CLOSED\]
==================================================================

by [postgraduatepic](https://fke.utm.my/author/postgraduatepic/ "Posts by postgraduatepic")
 | May 12, 2024 | [Anouncement](https://fke.utm.my/category/anouncement/)
, [Postgraduate-info](https://fke.utm.my/category/postgraduate-info/)

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/closed_writing-762x675.jpeg)

Join our FREE “Tips and Tricks: Thesis Writing Using Latex and MS Word” course and unlock the secrets to creating professional reports, polished presentations, and even dazzling dissertations!

Master Thesis Writing in both Latex and Word in this interactive session and learn:

1.  Essential formatting techniques for a polished look. ✨
2.  How to effortlessly create complex equations and symbols.
3.  Time-saving shortcuts and best practices for efficient workflow. ⏳
4.  Insider tips for a truly professional document.

Level up your academic documents today!

The course will be divided into two(2) sessions:  
Session 1 (8am-12pm) : Conceptual Overview session  
Session 2 (2pm – 5pm) : Hands on session

Register today via : [https://forms.gle/mMvVJeAzacS1tvVR7](https://forms.gle/mMvVJeAzacS1tvVR7)

Limited to 30 participants ONLY!
